name: cadillac-ev-cis
description: Cadillac EV Customer Intelligence System - Full Stack Application

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:ai" --names "Backend,Frontend,AI" --prefix-colors "blue,green,yellow"
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../ai-services && pip install -r requirements.txt

author: Cadillac Switzerland
